Cathryn Mataga (onye amụrụ William Mataga) bụ onye na-eme mmemme egwuregwu na onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ egwuregwu vidio Junglevision. N'okpuru aha William, o dere Atari 8-bit ezinụlọ egwuregwu maka Synapse Software na mbido ruo n'etiti afọ 1980, gụnyere Shamus, onye na-agba égbè flip-screen.

Mataga mepụtara egwuregwu Shamus na 1982, nke a na-akpọ William maka ezinụlọ Atari 8-bit. A na-ekwu na ọtụtụ n'ime arịrịọ egwuregwu ahụ sitere na ọchị Mataga, dị ka ịmepụta "nnukwu nsụgharị" nke egwu isiokwu Alfred Hitchcock na mmeghe egwuregwu ahụ. Mataga sochiri ya na ihe na-esote Shamus: Case II na onye na-agba égbè Zeppelin.
Steve Hales nke Synapse Software, n'ajụjụ ọnụ maka akwụkwọ Halcyon Days, kwuru na ya na Mataga mere ka onye guzobere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ Ihor Wolosenko kwenye itinye ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n'ime akụkọ ifo.

Mataga mepụtara asụsụ mmemme akụkọ ifo na-emekọrịta ihe nke a maara dị ka BtZ (Kwuo mma karịa Zork) maka Broderbund, na mbido afọ 1980.  Mataga so Hales na onye na-ede uri Robert Pinsky rụkọọ ọrụ na egwuregwu akụkọ ifo Mindwheel (1984).

Mataga bụ otu n'ime ndị mmemme na-arụ ọrụ na Stormfront Studios na Neverwinter Nights MMORPG mbụ. Don Daglow kwuru na Mataga bụ otu n'ime ndị mmemme gosipụtara nkwupụta Daglow na ọ nwere ike ime ka Neverwinter Nights nwee ihe ịga nke ọma.
